name: Slime!
description:
A small game about a jumping slime, soda machines and flying skulls. The design was inspired by Tsutomi Nihei's worlds (Blame!, Biomega, etc.).

Music (cc-by 3.0 and cc0/public domain):

Space ambient by Osimic https://opengameart.org/content/space-ambient

Bumblebee loop by jobromedia https://opengameart.org/content/bumblebee-loop

Cyberpunk Moonlight Sonata by Joth https://opengameart.org/content/cyberpunk-moonlight-sonata
